fields.name: AppPort
fields.description: Tells Dapr which port your application is listening on

fields.name: AppProtocol
fields.description: Tells Dapr which protocol your application is using. Valid options are http and grpc. Default is http

fields.name: EnableApiLogging
fields.description: Enables API logging for the Dapr sidecar

fields.name: Enabled
fields.description: Boolean indicating if the Dapr side car is enabled

fields.name: HTTPMaxRequestSize
fields.description: Increasing max size of request body http and grpc servers parameter in MB to handle uploading of big files. Default is 4 MB.

fields.name: HTTPReadBufferSize
fields.description: Dapr max size of http header read buffer in KB to handle when sending multi-KB headers. Default is 65KB.

fields.name: LogLevel
fields.description: Sets the log level for the Dapr sidecar. Allowed values are debug, info, warn, error. Default is info.
